pages.text: $(bgreen)Magnet Shroom$() is a powerful force. Very powerful. Sometimes it scares Magnet Shroom a little. He's not sure if he can handle that kind of responsibility.$(br)$(byellow)Sun Cost$() : $(l)100$()$(br)$(bblue)Recharge$() : $(l)Little Fast$()$(br)$(l)Features$() : It is a $(bred)Assist$() plant that can $(bred)steal metal objects$() from enemies in 12 blocks.
$(bpurple)Special :$() It can $(bred)destroy ladders$() on plants in 20 blocks. $(br)$(bgreen)Plant Food :$() It will $(l)steal$() several metal and $(l)throw$() them to hit enemies.
